code: import React from"react";import"../styling/DownloadButton.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DownloadButton(_ref){let{Tweets}=_ref;const download=()=>{const jsonData=JSON.stringify(Tweets);const blob=new Blob([jsonData],{type:"application/json"});const url=window.URL.createObjectURL(blob);const a=document.createElement("a");a.href=url;a.download="tweets.json";a.click();window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url);a.remove();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"DownloadButton",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:download,children:"Download current dataset"})});}export default DownloadButton;
